sense.def: Pathological Condition of tui 㿉 , prominence-illness, affecting the testicles of males. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 5: 卵 㿉，熟搗桃仁，敷之，亦療婦人陰腫，燥即易之 , “ Eggs affected by prominence-illness : Pound ripe tao ren to a pulp and smear them [on the afflicted region. This treatment] is also suitable for curing swelling in a woman’s genital parts. When it has dried, one must replace [the pulp]”. Luan tui 卵㿗 , eggs affected by breakdown-illness [2]

Pathological Condition identical with luan tui 卵㿉 , eggs affected by prominence-illness. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 26: 㿗有四種，有腸㿗、卵㿗、氣㿗、水㿗 , “There are four types of breakdown-illness: breakdown-illness affecting the intestines; breakdown-illness affecting the eggs (i.e. testicles) ; qi breakdown-illness; and water breakdown-illness”.
